tagline: Your one-stop solution for comfortable stays and professional meeting spaces.
chapaGateway: Integrated with Chapa payment gateway for secure transactions.
languagesSupported: Available in Oromo, Amharic, and English.
powerfulManagement: Powerful admin panel for easy management of facilities and bookings.
pageNotFoundMessage: Sorry, the page you are looking for does not exist or has been moved.
fillFormToBookDormitory: Fill out the form below to book your dormitory room.
selectDatesPrompt: Select your desired date range to see available dormitories.
selectBothStartAndEndDates: Please select both a start and end date for your booking.
enterEmployer: Enter your employer or organization name
bookingConfirmationMessage: Your booking request has been submitted. You will receive a confirmation once it's approved.
errorSavingBooking: There was an error saving your booking. Please try again.
couldNotCalculatePrice: Could not calculate the price. Please check item details.
dateRangeRequired: Date range is required for booking.
invalidDateRange: End date cannot be earlier than start date.
itemNotFound: The requested item could not be found.
noDormitoriesAvailable: No dormitories are currently listed or available.
pleaseSelectSectionsToBook: Please select one or more sections to book.
loginAsCompanyToBook: You need to be logged in as a company representative to book halls or sections.
fillFormToBookFacility: Fill out the form below to book your hall or section.
anySpecialRequests: Any special requests or additional notes?
facilityBookingPendingApproval: Your facility booking request has been submitted and is pending review. We will contact you shortly.
errorSubmittingBooking: There was an an error submitting your booking. Please try again.
enterCredentialsToAccessAccount: Enter your credentials to access your account.
invalidCredentials: Invalid email or password. Please try again.
companyRegistrationDescription: Register your company to access our facility booking services.
registrationSubmittedMessage: Your company registration has been submitted and is pending approval. We will notify you via email once it's reviewed.
unknownError: An unknown error occurred. Please try again later.
emailAlreadyInUseError: This email address is already in use. Please try a different email or login.
confirmDeleteBookingMessage: Are you sure you want to delete this booking? This action cannot be undone.
roomNumberExists: A dormitory with this room number already exists.
confirmDeleteDormitoryMessage: Are you sure you want to delete this dormitory? All associated data will be lost.

noDormitoriesFoundPleaseAdd: No dormitories found. Please add new ones.
confirmDeleteItem: Are you sure you want to delete this item?

name: Name
searchHallsSections: Search halls or sections by name...
noHallsFoundPleaseAdd: No halls or sections found. Please add new ones.

superAdminOnlyPage: This page is accessible only by Super Admins.
registerAdminDescription: Fill in the details to create a new administrator account.
adminRegisteredMessage: Admin user {email} has been registered successfully.
weakPasswordError: Password is too weak. It should be at least 6 characters.
paymentFailedMessage: There was an issue with your payment. Please try again or contact support.
yourBookingRequestHasBeenProcessed: Your booking request has been processed. Details are shown below.
thankYouFacilityBookingWillBeReviewed: Thank you for your booking. Your request for facility rental will be reviewed by our team, and we will contact you shortly for confirmation and payment.
dormitoryBookingPendingApproval: Your dormitory booking request has been received. Please find payment details above or on the next page. After payment, confirm by sending a screenshot to @oroedubot on Telegram. Your booking will be finalized after admin approval and payment verification.
incompleteBookingConfirmationDetails: Incomplete booking confirmation details. Please contact support.
paymentAwaitingVerificationDesc: Your payment is currently awaiting verification by our team. You will be notified once it's confirmed.
completeYourPaymentDescription: Please follow the instructions below to complete your payment.
paymentReferenceNote: Please use your Booking ID ({bookingId}) as the payment reference.
afterSendingProofAdminWillVerify: After sending proof, our admin team will verify your payment and confirm your booking.
submitPaymentProofDescription: Upload a screenshot or receipt of your bank transfer.
paymentProofFileDescription: Upload an image (JPG, PNG) or PDF of your payment.
errorUploadingProof: Error uploading payment proof. Please try again.
proofSubmittedMessage: Your payment proof has been submitted. We will verify it shortly.
bookingNotFound: Booking not found or already processed.
paymentNotExpectedOrAlreadyProcessed: Payment is not expected for this booking or has already been processed.
missingBookingId: Booking ID is missing. Cannot proceed.
fileTooLarge: File is too large. Max size: 5MB.
invalidFileType: Invalid file type. Please upload JPG, PNG, or PDF.
pageNoLongerInUseMessage: This page for submitting payment proof is no longer in use. Please follow the instructions on the payment details page to confirm your payment via Telegram.
myDormitoryDescription: Enter your phone number to check the status of your approved dormitory booking.
errorSearchingBookings: An error occurred while searching for your bookings.

viewAndManageFacilityBookings: View and manage all facility (hall/section) bookings.
agreementNotAvailableForBooking: An agreement document is not applicable or ready for this type of booking or its current status.
enterCustomTermsHere: Enter custom terms here. These will override the default terms for this specific agreement.
editTermsNote: Changes here only affect this agreement. Default terms remain for new agreements.
providerAddressPlaceholder: Oromia Education Main Office, Addis Ababa, Ethiopia
termsPlaceholder1: 1. Payment: Full payment is due upon signing this agreement unless otherwise specified. All payments are non-refundable except under conditions outlined herein.
termsPlaceholder2: 2. Cancellation: Cancellations made less than 7 days prior to the event date will forfeit the full rental fee. Cancellations made 7-14 days prior will receive a 50% refund. Cancellations made more than 14 days prior will receive a full refund, less a 10% administrative fee.
termsPlaceholder3: 3. Use of Facility: The Client agrees to use the facility solely for the purpose stated in the booking and in accordance_with all applicable laws and regulations. No alterations to the facility are permitted without prior written consent from Oromia Education Training Center.
termsPlaceholder4: 4. Liability: Oromia Education Training Center is not responsible for any loss, theft, or damage to personal property of the Client or their guests. The Client is responsible for any damage caused to the facility or equipment by their attendees.
yourBookingsDescription: View and manage your facility bookings.
noBookingsFound: You haven't made any bookings yet.
errorFetchingYourBookings: Could not fetch your bookings. Please try again later.
agreementConfirmedAndMockUploaded: Agreement confirmed as signed. (Mock upload successful)
errorMockUploadingAgreement: Error confirming signed agreement. (Mock upload failed)
agreementPreparationPending: Agreement is being prepared by admin.
accessDeniedViewAgreement: You do not have permission to view this agreement.
agreementNotReadyForViewing: The agreement for this booking is not yet ready for viewing by the client.
mustBeLoggedInAsCompanyToViewAgreement: You must be logged in as an approved company representative to view agreements.
itemNotFoundDatabase: {itemName} was not found in our records. It may have been removed.
facilityNotAvailableOverride: {itemName} is currently set as unavailable by the administrator.
itemUnavailableConflict: {itemName} is not available for the selected dates due to a conflicting booking.
errorCheckingAvailability: An error occurred while checking availability. Please try again or contact support.
dormitoryCapacityNotConfigured: The selected dormitory does not have its capacity configured correctly. Please contact administration.
dormitoryBedsUnavailable: All beds in {roomName} are booked for the selected dates.
sorryYouCannotBookTwice: Sorry, you cannot book twice for the same phone number on the same day. If you need to modify an existing booking, please contact us.
duplicateCheckSkippedBookingProceeds: A required database index for duplicate checking is missing. Your booking will proceed, but please be aware of potential duplicates. Admins will review.
firestoreIndexRequiredErrorDetailed: A database configuration (index) is required for this operation. Please contact support or an administrator.
phoneForTelegramIdentification: This phone number will be used for Telegram identification and payment proof.
phoneForTelegramIdentificationOptional: This phone number can be used for Telegram identification (optional).
selectDateRangeForReports: Select a date range to generate reports.
selectReportTypeAndDateRange: Choose a report type below. Ensure a date range is selected above.
viewOrPrintDormitoryBookingData: View or print periodic dormitory booking information.
noDataForReport: No data available for the selected report and date range.
selectDateRangeFirst: Please select a date range first.
dormitoryNotAvailableAdminOverride: Dormitory {roomNumber} is currently set as unavailable by the administrator. Please contact support if you believe this is an error.
itemNotAvailableError: {itemName} is currently not available for booking.
errorFetchingItemDetails: Error fetching item details. Please try again.
mustBeLoggedInAsCompanyToBookFacility: You must be logged in as an approved company representative to book facilities.

userDataMissingError: User data could not be found after login. Please contact support.
paymentReferenceNoteConfirmationPage: Remember to use your Booking ID ({bookingId}) as the payment reference.
telegramProofSubmissionInstruction: After making the bank transfer, please send a screenshot of your payment proof to our Telegram bot: {botUsername}. Include your phone number ({phoneNumber}) or Booking ID in the message for faster verification.
